Case# MPMoviePlaybackState.stopped

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case stopped
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlaybackState/stopped#Discussion)

Playback is currently stopped. Playback will commence from the beginning of the movie.
